price: Afei nokorε sε, Wusͻreε da no mobεgye akyinnye wͻ mo Wura Nyankopͻn anim.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمۡ تَخۡتَصِمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: thumma innakum yawma al-qiyāmati ʿinda rabbikum takhtaṣimūna
